title: Mica Burton is Here! - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 06.29.18
description:
Andy and Mica talk about Drake's kid, anime girls, and Disney Robot Sex.
http://www.instagram.com/micaburton
http://www.twitter.com/micaburton
http://www.patreon.com/micaburton

•The intros didn’t play and they were late – RESET THE TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES COUNTER (0:00 mins)
•VOTE FOR PROM KING/QUEEN: http://Bit.ly/kfpromvoting/
•Shit Arcade tonight (17:17 mins)
•Pusha T allegations about Drake is true (19:11 mins)
•Jared Leto confirms he is cast as Morbius (23:55 mins)
•Disney Imagineering has created autonomous robot stunt doubles (30:49 mins)
Thanks to https://Twitter.com/pissedlibrarian for our timestamps!

Thanks to Hims for sponsoring this episode. Start your trial month for $5 at http://forhims.com/gamesdaily

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
